posts.content:
I'm in the process of restoring the seats in the Pickup, and with the fabric removed found the driver's seat base has a number of the springs broken.

I'm getting some prices together for making new springs, does anyone else need some new springs for their seats?

Also, worth checking if anyone knows if there is anywhere that already stocks correct springs on the shelf?

Thanks.
The company has said that they can do them, so I'm about to send them a sample of the different types..

Got some prices now, depending on quantities...

Anyone else need any?
